entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 3:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Flurries or wet flurries early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
